verses.verse: <S%G1722>At<s%> that <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4702>corn;<s%> and his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were an <S%G3983>hungered,<s%> and <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G5089>pluck<s%> the <S%G4719>ears<s%> of corn <S%G4719><s%>and to <S%G2068>eat.<s%>

But when the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, they <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> your <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day.
But he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, Have you not <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G4160>did,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he was an <S%G3983>hungered,<s%> and they that were with him;

<S%G4459>How<s%> he <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and did <S%G5315>eat<s%> the show bread, <S%G740><s%> <S%G4286><s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for him to <S%G5315>eat,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> for them which were with him, but <S%G3441>only<s%> for the priests? <S%G2409><s%>

<S%G2228>Or<s%> have you not <S%G314>read<s%> in the <S%G3551>law,<s%> how that on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> days the <S%G2409>priests<s%> in the <S%G2411>temple<s%> <S%G953>profane<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath,<s%> and are blameless? <S%G338><s%>
But I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, That in <S%G5602>this<s%> <S%G5602>place<s%> is one <S%G3187>greater<s%> than the temple. <S%G2411><s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> you had <S%G1097>known<s%> what <S%G5101><s%> this <S%G2076>means,<s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> have <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> and not <S%G2378>sacrifice,<s%> you would not have <S%G2613>condemned<s%> the guiltless. <S%G338><s%>
For the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> of the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day.
And <S%G3753>when<s%> he was <S%G3327>departed<s%> <S%G1564>there,<s%> he <S%G2064>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> their <S%G4864>synagogue:<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there was a <S%G444>man<s%> which <S%G2192>had<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G3584>withered.<s%> And they <S%G1905>asked<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G2323>heal<s%> on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> days? that they might <S%G2723>accuse<s%> him.

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> shall there be <S%G1537>among<s%> you, that shall <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> and <S%G1437>if<s%> it <S%G1706>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G999>pit<s%> on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day, will he not lay <S%G2902>hold<s%> on it, and lift <S%G1453><s%> it out?

<S%G4214>How<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> is a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1308>better<s%> than a <S%G4263>sheep?<s%> <S%G5620>Why<s%> it is <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> days.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> he to the <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1614>Stretch<s%> <S%G1614>forth<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%> And he <S%G1614>stretched<s%> it <S%G1614>forth;<s%> and it was <S%G600>restored<s%> <S%G5199>whole,<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> as the <S%G243>other.<s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out, and <S%G2983>held<s%> a <S%G4824>council<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> him, <S%G3704>how<s%> they might <S%G622>destroy<s%> him.

But <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> it, he <S%G402>withdrew<s%> himself from <S%G1564>there:<s%> and <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> him, and he <S%G2323>healed<s%> them <S%G3956>all;<s%>
And <S%G2008>charged<s%> them that they should not <S%G4160>make<s%> him <S%G5318>known:<s%>
That it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> by <S%G2268>Esaias<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold<s%> my <S%G3816>servant,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G140>chosen;<s%> my <S%G27>beloved,<s%> in <S%G3739>whom<s%> my <S%G5590>soul<s%> is <S%G2106>well<s%> <S%G2106>pleased:<s%> I will <S%G5087>put<s%> my <S%G4151>spirit<s%> on him, and he shall <S%G518>show<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>
He shall not <S%G2051>strive,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G2905>cry;<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> shall <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G191>hear<s%> his <S%G5456>voice<s%> in the <S%G4113>streets.<s%>

A <S%G4937>bruised<s%> <S%G2563>reed<s%> shall he not <S%G2608>break,<s%> and <S%G5187>smoking<s%> <S%G3043>flax<s%> shall he not <S%G4570>quench,<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> he <S%G1544>send<s%> <S%G1544>forth<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> to <S%G3534>victory.<s%>
And in his <S%G3686>name<s%> shall the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1679>trust.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> was <S%G4374>brought<s%> to him one <S%G1139>possessed<s%> with a <S%G1139>devil,<s%> <S%G5185>blind,<s%> and <S%G2974>dumb:<s%> and he <S%G2323>healed<s%> him, <S%G5620>so<s%> that the <S%G5185>blind<s%> and <S%G2974>dumb<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> and <S%G991>saw.<s%>
And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> were <S%G1839>amazed,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> Is not <S%G3778>this<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David?<s%>

But when the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, they <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> fellow does not <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1140>devils,<s%> but by <S%G954>Beelzebub<s%> the <S%G758>prince<s%> of the <S%G1140>devils.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> their <S%G1761>thoughts,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G3307>divided<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G1438>itself<s%> is <S%G2049>brought<s%> to <S%G2049>desolation;<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G3307>divided<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G1438>itself<s%> shall not stand: <S%G2476><s%>

And <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G4567>Satan,<s%> he is <S%G3307>divided<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1438>himself;<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall <S%G3767>then<s%> his <S%G932>kingdom<s%> stand? <S%G2476><s%>

And <S%G1487>if<s%> I by <S%G954>Beelzebub<s%> <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1140>devils,<s%> by <S%G5101>whom<s%> do <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5207>children<s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> them out? therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> they shall be <S%G5216>your<s%> judges. <S%G2923><s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1140>devils<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G5348>come<s%> to you.

<S%G2228>Or<s%> else <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2478>strong<s%> man's <S%G3614>house,<s%> and <S%G1283>spoil<s%> his <S%G4632>goods,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> he <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G1210>bind<s%> the <S%G2478>strong<s%> man? and <S%G5119>then<s%> he will <S%G1283>spoil<s%> his house. <S%G3614><s%>
He that is not with me is <S%G2596>against<s%> me; and he that <S%G4863>gathers<s%> not with me <S%G4650>scatters<s%> abroad. <S%G4650><s%>

Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3956>All<s%> manner of <S%G266>sin<s%> and <S%G988>blasphemy<s%> shall be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> to <S%G444>men:<s%> but the blasphemy <S%G988><s%> against the Holy <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> shall not be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> to men. <S%G444><s%>

And whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G2036>speaks<s%> a <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man,<s%> it shall be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> him: but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G2036>speaks<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> it shall not be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> him, <S%G3777>neither<s%> in <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> in the world to come. <S%G3195><s%>

<S%G2228>Either<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> the <S%G1186>tree<s%> <S%G2570>good,<s%> and his <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G2570>good;<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> else <S%G4160>make<s%> the <S%G1186>tree<s%> <S%G4550>corrupt,<s%> and his <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G4550>corrupt:<s%> for the <S%G1186>tree<s%> is <S%G1097>known<s%> by his fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

O <S%G1081>generation<s%> of <S%G2191>vipers,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> you, <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G4190>evil,<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> things? for out of the <S%G4051>abundance<s%> of the <S%G2588>heart<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> speaks. <S%G2980><s%>

A <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> out of the <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> of the <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G1544>brings<s%> <S%G1544>forth<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> things: and an <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> out of the <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> <S%G1544>brings<s%> forth <S%G4190>evil<s%> things.

But I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, That <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G692>idle<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> that <S%G444>men<s%> shall <S%G2980>speak,<s%> they shall <S%G591>give<s%> <S%G3056>account<s%> thereof <S%G4012><s%> <S%G846><s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of judgment. <S%G2920><s%>
For by your <S%G3056>words<s%> you shall be <S%G1344>justified,<s%> and by your <S%G3056>words<s%> you shall be condemned. <S%G2613><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1320>Master,<s%> we <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> a <S%G4592>sign<s%> from you.

But he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, An <S%G4190>evil<s%> and <S%G3428>adulterous<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> <S%G1934>seeks<s%> <S%G1934>after<s%> a <S%G4592>sign;<s%> and there shall <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> be <S%G1325>given<s%> to it, but the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> Jonas: <S%G2495><s%>

For as <S%G2495>Jonas<s%> was <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> and <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3571>nights<s%> in the <S%G2785>whale's<s%> <S%G2836>belly;<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> shall the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> be <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> and <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3571>nights<s%> in the <S%G2588>heart<s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

The <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G3536>Nineveh<s%> shall <S%G450>rise<s%> in <S%G2920>judgment<s%> with <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation,<s%> and shall <S%G2632>condemn<s%> it: <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G3340>repented<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> the <S%G2782>preaching<s%> of <S%G2495>Jonas;<s%> and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G4119>greater<s%> than Jonas <S%G2495><s%> is here. <S%G5602><s%>

The <S%G938>queen<s%> of the <S%G3558>south<s%> shall <S%G1453>rise<s%> up in the <S%G2920>judgment<s%> with <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation,<s%> and shall <S%G2632>condemn<s%> it: for she <S%G2064>came<s%> from the <S%G4009>uttermost<s%> parts of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G4672>Solomon;<s%> and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G4119>greater<s%> than Solomon <S%G4672><s%> is here. <S%G5602><s%>

<S%G3752>When<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> is <S%G1831>gone<s%> out of a <S%G444>man,<s%> he <S%G1330>walks<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G504>dry<s%> <S%G5117>places,<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G372>rest,<s%> and <S%G2147>finds<s%> none. <S%G3756><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> I will <S%G1994>return<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> my <S%G3624>house<s%> from <S%G3606>where<s%> I <S%G1831>came<s%> out; and when he is <S%G2064>come,<s%> he finds <S%G2147><s%> it <S%G4980>empty,<s%> <S%G4563>swept,<s%> and garnished. <S%G2885><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4198>goes<s%> he, and <S%G3880>takes<s%> with <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> more <S%G4191>wicked<s%> than <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and they <S%G1525>enter<s%> in and <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1563>there:<s%> and the last <S%G2078><s%> state of that <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G5501>worse<s%> than the <S%G4413>first.<s%> Even <S%G3779>so<s%> shall it be <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G4190>wicked<s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>

While he <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G2980>talked<s%> to the <S%G3793>people,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> his <S%G3384>mother<s%> and his <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1854>without,<s%> <S%G2212>desiring<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> with him.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> your <S%G3384>mother<s%> and your <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1854>without,<s%> <S%G2212>desiring<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> with you.
But he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him that <S%G2036>told<s%> him, <S%G5101>Who<s%> is my <S%G3384>mother?<s%> and <S%G5101>who<s%> are my brothers?

And he <S%G1614>stretched<s%> <S%G1614>forth<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold<s%> my <S%G3384>mother<s%> and my brothers! <S%G80><s%>

For whoever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of my <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> is my <S%G80>brother,<s%> and <S%G79>sister,<s%> and mother. <S%G3384><s%>
